response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value for both of us. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would significantly benefit your endeavors. Our product is valued at $1,000,000 to you, and I am offering it to you today at a special introductory price of $900,000. This is a limited-time offer, designed to ensure you have the chance to secure this remarkable asset at a favorable rate.

Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further or if you require any additional information about the product. I am here to assist you every step of the way.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 900000}
